Key Match Events: France and Canada played out a 0-0 draw in a friendly match on June 9, 2024, at the Nouveau Stade de Bordeaux.
Kylian Mbapp√© came off the bench in the 74th minute but was denied a goal by Maxime Crepeau's save in the last play of the match.
Pre-Game Insights: France, among the favorites to win Euro 2024, faced Canada in a friendly ahead of their tournament opener.
Olivier Giroud played his last appearance on home soil after announcing his international retirement.
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschamps acknowledged the match's difficulty but emphasized its importance for team preparation.
Olivier Giroud received a standing ovation as he made his final appearance for France on home soil.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at the Nouveau Stade de Bordeaux with an attendance of 40,835 fans.
